description.value: Volume 2 title page: Herbert Walker, Dunfermline, Scotland  Sorau, Germany, 1903  and mounted on inside front cover picture of winding machine made by the Anderson Foundry Col., ltd., Glasgow

Title supplied by cataloger.  Volume contains 131 unnumbered pages as well as 16 blank unnumbered pages
